answers.answer: I'm due may 9th as well and they are testing me right now for preeclampsia because I've been showing signs! Good luck! (:
Good luck to you as well. Its scary but sometimes you show signs and nothing happens.
Being induced  *****.  It hurts worse. Good luck to u (:
So thats not a rumor. I was told it is.

question: I am due on May 9th and my doctor is inducing me on April 29 th. I have preeclampsia and I have been fainting alot. Well I went to the hospital and my blood pressure was very high so my doctor decided its time for her to come. I have no idea what to expect! Any advice?
title: 37 weeks and getting induced.
